subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Chicago’s victory, which ended an eight-game skid, came two innings after the White Sox scored five runs in the 14th, only to have Seattle tie it on Kyle Seager’s grand slam.
snippet: Chicago’s victory, which ended an eight-game skid, came two innings after the White Sox scored five runs in the 14th, only to have Seattle tie it on Kyle Seager’s grand slam.
